conversation.text: How are you settling in to Brookhaven? Finding everything all right?
Yeah, thanks. About my roommate.../Actually, how do roommate swaps work?
Let me stop you right there--roommate determinations are final, no matter what you may have seen on the home feed. I’m sorry, but you’ll have to tough it out. I hear it builds character.
Great meeting you in class today!
I was wondering if you could help me find this book for my class?
Sure thing, how are you settling in?
Things are okay, but I think my new roommate kind of hates me./My roommate is a real jerk./How soon can I put in for a roommate transfer.
Don’t worry, you can make plenty of friends without getting along with your roommate. In fact, let’s grab dinner later. I’ll introduce you to some people.
You could also join a Society. That’s where I’ve made a lot of my friends.
Not bad, although...do you know anything about the Societies?
Yeah, they’re great! That’s where I’ve made a lot of my friends, actually.
I’m in Leverage, but they each have a different focus. I might have a list somewhere I could dig up?
